charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1101_0200_:
In [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] enthusiasm, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
trained a little too hard and pushed [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="himself" F="herself" ] to the
point of exhaustion.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_0400_: Hah! You need to work on your endurance!
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_0500_:
Excuse me. If I’m not mistaken, you’re the Kanto
Champion, Blue, yes?
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_0600_: Please battle us! We’re going to beat you!
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_0700_:
Hey now. My time as the Champion of Kanto was
pretty short-lived, y’know.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_0800_:
But sure, why not! Let’s make it a tag-team
match, though!
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1101_0900_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] somehow mustered
the energy to get up and join Blue for the battle.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_1000_:
Don’t just react to what your opponent does!
Read their movements and act before they do!
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_1100_: Wait! Now you’re getting ahead of yourself!
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_1200_:
Watch and learn! This is how a Pokémon battle
should be fought!
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_1300_: Oh man! That was way too close! We almost lost!
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_1400_:
This sygna suit I’m wearing may have been what
saved us.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_0401_1600_: The design of my sygna suit is based on Blastoise.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_0402_1800_: The design of my sygna suit is based on Blastoise.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_1900_:
It lets me fight in battles as if I’ve become
Blastoise myself.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_2000_:
We were in a tight spot just now. In situations like
that, I feel like my sygna suit gives me a boost to
help me power through.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_2100_:
I never noticed that before! I should probably
thank those two sync pairs for helping me see it!
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_0401_2300_:
I bet that battle was a good experience for you,
too, huh?
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_0402_2500_:
I bet that battle was a good experience for you,
too, huh?
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_2600_:
Giving everything you’ve got when you’re already
running on empty is hands down the best way
to train.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_2700_: That’s how we’ve always done it, after all.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_0401_2900_:
Blastoise and I have overcome a lot of tough
situations over the years.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_0402_3100_:
Blastoise and I have overcome a lot of tough
situations over the years.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_3200_:
There were lots of times when I felt so beat down,
physically and mentally, that I didn’t think I could
keep going.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_3300_:
But being in those tough situations would always
fire me up. And the joy I felt when we overcame
them was like nothing I’d ever felt before.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_3400_:
Know what I mean? You gotta cherish the good 
times and the bad times that you spend with
your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_3500_:
That will help strengthen your bonds with your
partner Pokémon. It’ll give you strength and
courage, too.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_3600_:
Blastoise used to immediately retreat into his shell
at the first sign of things going south.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_3700_:
But now he’s exactly the opposite. When things get
tough, he cranes his neck as far out as he can to
get a good view of the situation.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_0401_3900_:
I’m not just telling you my life story here, OK?
I want you two to learn from this and get
stronger as well.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_0402_4100_: Thanks. But now it’s your turn to get stronger.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_4200_:
Blastoise and I are working to become the
strongest sync pair so we can beat Red...
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_4300_:
but it’d be boring for us if all you future
generations of Trainers didn’t get stronger, too!
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_4400_:
And I guess I don’t really mind teaching
people, either.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_4500_: I’m better at it than Red is, anyway.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_4600_:
I can’t even imagine him teaching anything
to anyone.
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_4700_:
Anyway, I hope you’re ready, ’cause I’ve got even
more intense training coming your way!
charaepi_ch0021_01_green/2301_1201_4800_:
It’s time to get serious! We’re not done until I say
we are!
